Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans

K-means clustering and variations.

See: Description


  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    KMeansInitialization<V extends NumberVector<V,?>>
    Interface for initializing K-Means
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractKMeans<V extends NumberVector<V,?>,D extends Distance<D>>
    Abstract base class for k-means implementations.
    AbstractKMeansInitialization<V extends NumberVector<V,?>>
    Abstract base class for common k-means initializations.
    AbstractKMeansInitialization.Parameterizer<V extends NumberVector<V,?>>
    Parameterization class.
    FirstKInitialMeans<V extends NumberVector<V,?>>
    Initialize K-means by using the first k objects as initial means.
    FirstKInitialMeans.Parameterizer<V extends NumberVector<V,?>>
    Parameterization class.
    KMeansLloyd<V extends NumberVector<V,?>,D extends Distance<D>>
    Provides the k-means algorithm, using Lloyd-style bulk iterations.
    KMeansLloyd.Parameterizer<V extends NumberVector<V,?>,D extends Distance<D>>
    Parameterization class.
    KMeansMacQueen<V extends NumberVector<V,?>,D extends Distance<D>>
    Provides the k-means algorithm, using MacQueen style incremental updates.
    KMeansMacQueen.Parameterizer<V extends NumberVector<V,?>,D extends Distance<D>>
    Parameterization class.
    KMeansPlusPlusInitialMeans<V extends NumberVector<V,?>,D extends NumberDistance<D,?>>
    K-Means++ initialization for k-means.
    KMeansPlusPlusInitialMeans.Parameterizer<V extends NumberVector<V,?>,D extends NumberDistance<D,?>>
    Parameterization class.
    RandomlyChosenInitialMeans<V extends NumberVector<V,?>>
    Initialize K-means by randomly choosing k exsiting elements as cluster centers.
    RandomlyChosenInitialMeans.Parameterizer<V extends NumberVector<V,?>>
    Parameterization class.
    RandomlyGeneratedInitialMeans<V extends NumberVector<V,?>>
    Initialize k-means by generating random vectors (within the data sets value range).
    RandomlyGeneratedInitialMeans.Parameterizer<V extends NumberVector<V,?>>
    Parameterization class.
